name: whatsupp
description: Native desktop app/wrapper for https://web.whatsapp.com. Built with Electron.

scripts.gettext: xgettext app/*.js -j --omit-header -o app/locale/messages.pot && xgettext app/html/*.html -L JavaScript -j --omit-header -o app/locale/messages.pot
scripts.pkg:debian64: electron-installer-debian --bin WhatsUpp --src dist/WhatsUpp-linux-x64/ --dest dist/pkg --arch amd64 --icon assets/icons/whatsupp.png
scripts.pkg:debian32: electron-installer-debian --bin WhatsUpp --src dist/WhatsUpp-linux-ia32/ --dest dist/pkg --arch i386 --icon assets/icons/whatsupp.png
